00024 //dont define to allow narrow since these are the narrow definitions
00025 //#define MV_NO_NARROW
00026 
00027 //C4530: C++ exception handler used, but unwind semantics are not enabled. 
00028 #pragma warning (disable: 4530)
00029 
00030 #include <exodus/mvimpl.h>
00031 #include <exodus/mv.h>
00032 #include <exodus/mvexceptions.h>
00033 
00034 namespace exodus {
00035 
00036 //ctor for char
00037 //use initializers since cannot fail (but could find how to init the char1)
00038 var::var(const char char1):
00039         var_mvtype(pimpl::MVTYPE_STR)
00040         //,var_mvstr(const_cast<wchar_t>char1)
00041 {
00042         //cannot fail
00043         //THISIS(L"var::var(const char char1)")
00044 
00045         //not a pointer anymore for speed
00046         //priv=new pimpl;
00047 
00048         //var_mvtype=pimpl::MVTYPE_STR;
00049         wchar_t widechar=char1;
00050         var_mvstr=widechar;
00051 }
00052 
00053 //ctor for c_str
00054 //dont use initialisers and protect against null pointer
00055 var::var(const char* cstr1)
00056 {
00057 
00058         //not a pointer anymore for speed
00059         //priv=new pimpl;
00060 
00061         //protect against null pointer
00062         if (cstr1==0)
00063         {
00064                 THISIS(L"var::var(const char* cstr1)")
00065                 throw MVInvalidPointer("Null pointer in var(const char*)");
00066         }
00067 
00068         std::string str1=cstr1;
00069         //dont convert from UTF8 to speed execution of programs written with strings like aaa="xxx" instead of aaa=L"xxx"
00070         //therefore requires manual conversion of any c strings from other sources eg operating system
00071         var_mvstr=std::wstring(str1.begin(),str1.end());
00072 
00073         var_mvtype=pimpl::MVTYPE_STR;
00074 }
00075 
00076 //ctor for memory block
00077 //dont use initialisers and TODO protect against out of memory in expansion to wstring
00078 var::var(const char* cstr1, const size_t int1)
00079 {
00080         //cannot fail
00081         //THISIS(L"var::var(const char* cstr1, const size_t int1)")
00082 
00083         //TODO optimise and UTF conversion
00084         //var_mvtype=pimpl::MVTYPE_STR;
00085         std::string cstr2(cstr1,int1);
00086         var_mvstr=std::wstring(cstr2.begin(),cstr2.end());
00087         var_mvtype=pimpl::MVTYPE_STR;
00088 }
00089 
00090 //comparisons with narrow characters
00091 
00092 bool operator ==(const var&    var1    ,const char*  char2   ){return MVeq(var1,var(char2));}
00093 bool operator ==(const char*  char1  ,const var&    var2     ){return MVeq(var2,var(char1));}
00094 
00095 bool operator !=(const var&    var1    ,const char*  char2   ){return !MVeq(var1,var(char2));}
00096 bool operator !=(const char*  char1  ,const var&    var2     ){return !MVeq(var2,var(char1));}
00097 
00098 bool operator < (const var&    var1    ,const char*  char2   ){return MVlt(var1,var(char2));}
00099 bool operator < (const char*  char1  ,const var&    var2     ){return MVlt(var(char1),var2);}
00100 
00101 bool operator >=(const var&    var1    ,const char*  char2   ){return !MVlt(var1,var(char2));}
00102 bool operator >=(const char*  char1  ,const var&    var2     ){return !MVlt(var(char1),var2);}
00103 
00104 bool operator > (const var&    var1    ,const char*  char2   ){return MVlt(var(char2),var1);}
00105 bool operator > (const char*  char1  ,const var&    var2     ){return MVlt(var2,var(char1));}
00106 
00107 bool operator <=(const var&    var1    ,const char*  char2   ){return !MVlt(var(char2),var1);}
00108 bool operator <=(const char*  char1  ,const var&    var2     ){return !MVlt(var2,var(char1));}
00109 
00110 }// of namespace exodus
